welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vitoria-Gasteiz, a city known for its charming old town, beautiful parks, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy exploring all that our city has to offer and have a wonderful time during your stay.

restaurants.name: La Tagliatella
restaurants.description: La Tagliatella is a italian restaurant located in Vitoria.
restaurants.address: Calle Sancho El Sabio, 1, BAJO, 01008 Vitoria País Vasco

restaurants.name: Restaurante KoTarro
restaurants.description: Restaurante KoTarro is a restaurant located in Vitoria.
restaurants.address: Sancho el Sabio 11, 01008 Vitoria País Vasco

restaurants.name: El Mexicano y Mucho Más
restaurants.description: El Mexicano y Mucho Más is a taco restaurant located in Vitoria.
restaurants.address: Calle de Arantzabal #9, 01008 Vitoria País Vasco

restaurants.name: Restaurante El Clarete
restaurants.description: Restaurante El Clarete is a restaurant located in Vitoria.
restaurants.address: Cercas Bajas, 18 (Beato Tomás de Zumarraga), 01001 Vitoria País Vasco

restaurants.name: Dolomiti
restaurants.description: Dolomiti is a italian restaurant located in Vitoria.
restaurants.address: Ramon y Cajal, 1 (Parque de la Florida), 01007 Vitoria País Vasco

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vitoria Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Vitoria Airport, mainly used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time or data limits.
